title: Diet Detox Package
description: Ha2cg drops are part of this package which helps control appetite, reduce hunger and support glucose metabolism
cleaned_text: $ 199.95 $ 0.00 Diet Detox Package Ha2cg drops This unique formulation supports crucial body systems to: - Help control appetite, reduce hunger, support glucose metabolism - Stimulates the body to release fat - Support organ systems involved in metabolism, detoxification, and drainage - Help reduce uncomfortable side-effects associated with dieting, including: low moods, lack of energy, and fatigue - Diminish plateaus and ineffective periods of weight loss - Improve successful maintenance of weight dramatically Ha2cg EVOLUTION Guideto Success will help you understand DesBios Weight Management program and give you step by step directions on the hA2cg protocol to lose weight. The Comprehensive Detox Kit is our Homeopathic Detox Kit which facilitates the detoxification and drainage of the entire body. This complete protocol serves as the starting place for all other Desbio programs, including other forms of detox and our hA2cg Evolution Weight Management Program. This package includes: 1 bottle Ha2cg Evolution drops (1 fluid ounce) 1 booklet Ha2cg Evolution Weight-Management Program Guide 1 Comprehensive Detox Kit (six 1 ounce bottles) *The uses for our products are based on traditional homeopathic practice. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. *This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
